item.title: Laura add a quote by Jerry Spinelli
item.description: "She was bendable light: she shone around every corner of my day." -- Jerry Spinelli

item.title: Laura add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "There must be quite a few things that a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Laura add a quote by E. Lockhart
item.description: "How was I supposed to concentrate on my mental health when my therapist was encased in orange sparkle madness?" -- E. Lockhart

item.title: Laura add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "It’s a rare man who is taken for what he truly is." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Laura add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "No mockery in this world ever sounds to me so hollow as that of being told to cultivate happiness. What does such advice mean? Happiness is not a potato, to be planted in mould, and tilled with manure. Happiness is a glory shining far down upon us out of Heaven. She is a divine dew which the soul, on certain of its summer mornings, feels dropping upon it from the amaranth bloom and golden fruitage of Paradise." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Laura add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "I believe in some blending of hope and sunshine sweetening the worst lots. I believe that this life is not all; neither the beginning nor the end. I believe while I tremble; I trust while I weep." -- Charlotte Bronte
